message: Often this package is not referenced directly, but as a dependency of WebGrease
Provides javascript, css and image optimisation and minification. ASP.NET Core defaults to gulp for these tasks.
linkText: Forum question on whether .NET Core will be supported

message: Until the build tooling stabilised (ie going back to msbuild), there is an alternative way of packaging.
linkText: Octopus - Deploying ASP.NET Core Web Applications
